insert into kfq_geom (type_name, start_time, "area", the_geom, end_time) values
( #{shapeModel.type_name}, #{shapeModel.startTime}, #{shapeModel.area}::numeric , st_setsrid(st_geomfromtext(#{shapeModel.the_geom}),4326), #{shapeModel.endTime} )

insert into kfq_geom_change (type_name, value, start_time, area, the_geom, end_time, "type", "from", "to") values
( #{shapeChangeModel.type_name},#{shapeChangeModel.value},#{shapeChangeModel.startTime},#{shapeChangeModel.area}::numeric, st_setsrid(st_geomfromtext(#{shapeChangeModel.the_geom}),4326),#{shapeChangeModel.endTime},#{shapeChangeModel.type},#{shapeChangeModel.from}, #{shapeChangeModel.to} )
mapper.select: select type_name, "value", start_time, area, st_astext(st_union(the_geom)) as "the_geom", end_time, "type", "from", "to" from kfq_geom_change where start_time = #{startTime} and end_time = #{endTime} and "type_name" = #{typeName} group by type_name, "value", start_time, area, end_time, "type", "from", "to"
